Who I Am

I am a video game creator and software developer who lives in Portland, Oregon, where I’m active in the indie game community. I enjoy overseeing many aspects of the creative and production process; I have worked in project management, writing, design, programming, visuals and more.

I am also the owner of Side Group, my video game development and publishing company.

Contact Me

I can be contacted directly at reismahnic@gmail.com.
